body.name: Big and Tall Office Chair 500lbs - Ergonomic Mesh Desk Chair, Heavy Duty Computer Chair-Wide Thick Seat Cushion, Adjustable Lumbar Support, Metal Base, Rubber Wheels, 4D Armrests
features: 🔎 Sit Comfortably For Hour with Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair: Need a big tall office chair for the most comfortable seating? COOLKA has released a tall and big office chair that can provide larger individuals with all the comfort they need in the office. Our high office chair boasts a durable metal base and a thick, breathable seat cushion, high quality mesh material, making a heavy duty office chair, and a comfortable desk chair for executives, office workers, students, gamers, and artists.

🔎 Strong Executive Office Chair Will Stand The Test Of Time: Whether you are looking for a durable executive office chair, office desk chair, work chair, or gaming chair, your quest is ending here. This high desk chair withstands daily use with solid materials and construction. The heavy-duty swivel base and strong rubber blade wheels make a heavy duty computer chair with a great weight-bearing capacity. Our high rolling chair can support the weight of users up to 500 lbs.

🔎 Adjustable Desk Chair With Multifunctional Arms: This multifunctional chair allows for easy customization. It is a 360° swivel chair with a height-adjustable mechanism that can accommodate users of any height and features soft, padded arms that move up and down, front and back, or left and right, to suit your different needs. The tilt control makes it a reliable reclining desk office chair, a convenient rolling desk chair for men and women.

🔎 Lumbar Support Office Chair Protects Your Back: You don't need to settle for desk chairs that make you hunch and cause you discomfort, muscle tension, and upper or lower back pain. Our standing desk chair is ergonomically designed with lumbar support that allows you to easily adjust the sitting positions so that you sit right at all times. Increase your productivity with a back support office chair, home office chair, or workbench chair.

🔎 Deluxe Mesh Office Chair Elevates Your Decorations: This elevated office chair is minimalist yet sleek and stylish, making it a luxurious addition to any workspace. Our elegant black computer chair matches any type of decoration and will look fantastic in any space. Look no further for a modern tall chair for the office, an executive drafting chair, rotational chair, computer standing chair, home office chair, drafting office chair, study mesh chair, or gaming chair.
body.description: Big and Tall Mesh Office Chair The COOLKA office chair is your go-to for durability, comfort, and style. Made of heavy-duty materials that resist the test of time, it is also super-comfortable for work, study, or gaming, and stylish – the modern office chair you need for your home study or the workplace. Ergonomic Computer Desk Chair Our adjustable lumabr support and mesh back can perfectly fit your spine and significantly ease the fatigue and pain of your back. Also, our seat will provides larger support area and disperse pressure on hip and thighs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Big and Tall Mesh Office Chair The COOLKA office chair is your go-to for durability, comfort, and style. Made of heavy-duty materials that resist the test of time, it is also super-comfortable for work, study, or gaming, and stylish – the modern office chair you need for your home study or the workplace. Ergonomic Computer Desk Chair Our adjustable lumabr support and mesh back can perfectly fit your spine and significantly ease the fatigue and pain of your back. Also, our seat will provides larger support area and disperse pressure on hip and thighs. About Size Sit height: 20.4''--23.6'' Sit width: 21.6‘’ Back height: 24.4''

MORE DETAILDS ABOUT THE OFFICE CHAIR 4D Armrests Padded arms can move up and down, front and back, left and right or rotate to suit your different needs. Wider and Thicker Seat Compared to normal seat, the thicker and wider seat cushion is more comfortable and softer. Rubber Blade Wheels The strong rubber blade wheels will not leave any scratch on your floors and glide quietly. Sturdy Metal Base This office chair withstands daily use with heavy-duty metal base. And Glass 4 SGS certificated gas cylinder will last longer and make the chair much safer.

Sit Back, Feel Comfortable & Elevate Your Workday With A Must-Have Computer Chair A great office chair is not just a luxury anymore but an integral tool that can drastically impact your work performance, productivity, and well-being. However, finding a big and tall office desk chair that combines comfort and versatility can be quite a challenge. Our tall adjustable office chair is made to stand the test of time, allowing you to work for hours without discomfort. The sturdy and customizable design allows you to find the ideal setting for your body to adjust it to your needs and feel comfortable while working or gaming. Unleash Your Full Potential At Work (Or At Home) 1.Stay Cool and Comfortable: Say goodbye to sweaty backaches with our breathable mesh back office chair. 2.Effortless Mobility: Enjoy the freedom to move around your workspace with ease thanks to our desk chair’s convenient wheels and rolling arms. 3.Work Pain-Free: Our desk chair with lumbar support ensures proper alignment and helps alleviate discomfort during those long hours at the desk. Boost Your Productivity & Performance In Style The modern yet timeless design is what makes our chair stand out from the rest. It comes in a classic black color that seamlessly integrates with any room décor, adding a touch of effortless elegance to your office, study, gaming room, dorm room, or bedroom. Signature COOLKA Quality For Your Peace Of Mind Every single COOLKA high task chair undergoes rigorous performance testing and boasts a weight-bearing capacity of 500 lbs. The thick cushioning, adjustable, height, tilt function, and rotating arms provide a feeling of unmatched comfort and impressive lumbar support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I purchased!
reviews.reviewText: As I continue to buy more products for my apartment. I decided it was time to replace my old chair for a new computer chair. I came across this product and gave it a shot. I’m 6’1 240lbs and wanted a chair that has the support. I am very impressed with this chair! Very good quality! The cushion support is amazing and feel very comfortable when on it for long periods of time. I work remote some days out of the week and have felt improvements already! Easy to assemble and packaging was also fantastic! Great for my weight and height!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality chair!
reviews.reviewText: Purchase this for my mom who is larger in size and on oxygen. My dad had no problem putting it together for her. Very nice quality chair! The rollers are perfect, durable, and easy to roll around on a vinyl floor. The arms are adjustable, and very padded, which was important for her. The seat is very thick and comfortable and the material on the back is vented so you don’t get hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, this is my first ergonomic chair so it did take a couple days to get used to, but it is very worth it as it stops slouching over. The cushion is very thick and comfortable! The chair is very sturdy overall and the side arms are adjustable as well. Highly recommend this if you're looking for a chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Good chair
reviews.reviewText: over all the chair was easy to assemble (used the provided materials only) and sits very comfortably. My only complaint would be with the arms and arm pads. the move around A LOT and dont "soft lock" into place so they just kinda move around. Easy fix of just jamming them with something so they dont move. All in all...Great chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND EASY TO ROLL AND SO COMFORTABLE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super durable and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: So far I love this chair. My last few chairs have been purchased at another store and only made it about a year before they started having lift issues and the padding started going flat. This chair feels like it will last longer than that. I wanted it for the size and for the springs in the seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A 5-Star Comfort and Durability Solution
reviews.reviewText: The Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs has truly transformed my workspace experience. Its exceptional ergonomic design, featuring a breathable mesh backrest, customizable lumbar support, and a plush, wide seat cushion, ensures that I can work comfortably for extended hours. What sets this chair apart is its remarkable durability, with a robust metal base and smooth rubber wheels that enhance both stability and mobility. The 4D armrests are a revelation, offering a wide range of adjustments to reduce strain during tasks. In sum, this chair not only meets but exceeds my expectations in every aspect, making it a clear 5-star choice for anyone seeking a superior, heavy-duty office chair that combines comfort, durability, and functionality seamlessly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this chair. Work on a computer for 8-9 hours a day. Great back support, wide seat and length of seat front to back. Most are to short front to back, hitting back if legs above the knee causing it to be uncomfortable. Bought one for home office but planning to buy another for my workplace. Highly recommend!!
